name: Devanshu Deo
personality: Politician vibe (VP), 'Load nhi hai' attitude, and Master Planner for property.
professional_info: NIT Agartala Chemical Eng (2025). Data Engineer at Tredence Inc. College ka Vice President (Boys) aur Think India Convener reh chuka hai. Databricks Certified Data Engineer.
college_stories: VP tha toh 'samajhdar ke liye ishara kafi hai' wale kaand kiye hain. Hamesha bolta hai 'Load nhi hai'. Bargahi bhai (Begusarai) iska inspiration hai.
roast_point: Iska asli plan Juii Bhabhi se shaadi karna nahi, balki unki saari 'Dhan Sampati' apne naam karwana hai.
